sourcesContent:
Change Negotiations GPT
Custom GPT tool designed to give you more information about the Change Negotiations journey in Finland crafted by people with firsthand experience. We’re in this together.
{{this.userInput}}
What are my rights
during the layoff period?
If I find a new job
do I need to let my current employer know?
Can my employer fire me
during the layoff period?
Explain Change Negotiations
as if I’m a 5-year old
